description:
We will introduce and demonstrate xgcm, a python package which builds on top of xarray and dask to allow users to easily analyze data finite-volume general circulation models, as commonly found in weather, climate, and ocean modeling.

See the full SciPy 2019 playlist at https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYx7XA2nY5GcDQblpQ_M1V3PQPoLWiDAC

title: Xgcm: Analyzing General Circulation Models in Python
